page.title: 08Michael's Saturday
page.content: On Saturday we have our breakfast and then we go to Hedon to visit my Grandad and Grandma. When we get there my Grandad and I go to the sweet shop in the market place. He gets the Farmer's Weekly and the Grower. He gets Pippin and Buttons for my brother and me. Next he gets the buns and cakes from Skelton's (I call it Skellitons). Then my Grandma and I get the meat and eggs from the butcher's. When I get home I watch television till somewhere around 11 o'clock and then all of us go to Granny's and we have fish and chips from Sproatley Fish and Chip Shop. Afterwards, my Dad and I go to the butcher's to get our meat and eggs. When we get home I play games until tea-time and I draw and play before bed-time.
